snippet: The founder of Prescreen.com, a former Groupon executive, says the idea for the business came to him at Sundance in 2010, when he noticed that most movies there would never be seen again.
abstract: The founder of Prescreen.com, a former Groupon executive, says the idea for the business came to him at Sundance in 2010, when he noticed that most movies there would never be seen again.

headline.main: New Rental Service Focuses on Indie Film
